DellInfiniBand.description: An instance of DellInfiniBand will have InfiniBand device specific data.
DellInfiniBand.longDescription: An instance of DellInfiniBand will have InfiniBand device specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BusNumber.description: This property represents the bus number where this PCI device resides.
BusNumber.longDescription: This property represents the bus number where this PCI device resides.

ConnectFirstTarget.description: This property represents the Connect First Target.
ConnectFirstTarget.longDescription: This property represents the Connect First Target.

ControllerBIOSVersion.description: This property represents the firmware version of Controller BIOS.
ControllerBIOSVersion.longDescription: This property represents the firmware version of Controller BIOS.

DataBusWidth.description: This property represents the data-bus width of the InfiniBand device.
DataBusWidth.longDescription: This property represents the data-bus width of the InfiniBand device.

DeviceDescription.description: A string that contains the friendly Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD), which is a property that describes the device and its location.
DeviceDescription.longDescription: A string that contains the friendly Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD), which is a property that describes the device and its location.

DeviceNumber.description: This property represents the device number assigned to this PCI device for this bus.
DeviceNumber.longDescription: This property represents the device number assigned to this PCI device for this bus.

EFIVersion.description: This property represents the firmware version of EFI.
EFIVersion.longDescription: This property represents the firmware version of EFI.

FQDD.description: A string that contains the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD), which is a user-friendly name for the object.
FQDD.longDescription: A string that contains the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD), which is a user-friendly name for the object.

FamilyVersion.description: This property represents the family version of firmware.
FamilyVersion.longDescription: This property represents the family version of firmware.

FirstTargetChapId.description: This property represents the First Target ChapId.
FirstTargetChapId.longDescription: This property represents the First Target ChapId.

FirstTargetChapPwd.description: This property represents the First Target ChapPassword.
FirstTargetChapPwd.longDescription: This property represents the First Target ChapPassword.

FunctionNumber.description: This property represents the function number for this PCI device.
FunctionNumber.longDescription: This property represents the function number for this PCI device.

ISCSIOSDriverVersion.description: This property represents the ISCSI OS Driver version.
ISCSIOSDriverVersion.longDescription: This property represents the ISCSI OS Driver version.

InfiniBandOSDriverVersion.description: This property represents the InfiniBand OS Driver version.
InfiniBandOSDriverVersion.longDescription: This property represents the InfiniBand OS Driver version.

InstanceID.description: A unique identifier for the instance.
InstanceID.longDescription: A unique identifier for the instance.

IscsiInitiatorSubnetPrefix.description: This property represents the Iscs iInitiator SubnetPrefix.
IscsiInitiatorSubnetPrefix.longDescription: This property represents the Iscs iInitiator SubnetPrefix.

LANDriverVersion.description: This property represents the LAN OS Driver version.
LANDriverVersion.longDescription: This property represents the LAN OS Driver version.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property represents the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented in the format yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property represents the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented in the format yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property represents the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented in the format yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property represents the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented in the format yyyymmddHHMMSS.

MediaType.description: This property represents the drive media type.
MediaType.longDescription: This property represents the drive media type.

NodeGUID.description: A string that contains the Node GUID.
NodeGUID.longDescription: A string that contains the Node GUID.

NumberOfPorts.description: This property represents the number of ports.
NumberOfPorts.longDescription: This property represents the number of ports.

NumberPCIEFunctionsEnabled.description: This property represents the number of PCIE functions enabled per port.
NumberPCIEFunctionsEnabled.longDescription: This property represents the number of PCIE functions enabled per port.

NumberPCIEFunctionsSupported.description: This property represents the number of PCIE functions supported per port.
NumberPCIEFunctionsSupported.longDescription: This property represents the number of PCIE functions supported per port.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIDeviceID.description: This property contains a value assigned by the device manufacturer used to identify the type of device.
PCIDeviceID.longDescription: This property contains a value assigned by the device manufacturer used to identify the type of device.

PCISubVendorID.description: This property represents the subsystem vendor ID. ID information is reported from a PCIDevice through protocol-specific requests.
PCISubVendorID.longDescription: This property represents the subsystem vendor ID. ID information is reported from a PCIDevice through protocol-specific requests.

PCIVendorID.description: This property represents the register that contains a value assigned by the PCI SIG used to identify the manufacturer of the device.
PCIVendorID.longDescription: This property represents the register that contains a value assigned by the PCI SIG used to identify the manufacturer of the device.

PermanentPortGUID.description: This property defines port GUID that is hardcoded into a port . This hardcoded address can be changed using a firmware upgrade or a software configuration. When this change is made, the field must updated at the same time. If no hardcoded GUID exists for the InfiniBand card, PermanentAddress must be left blank.
PermanentPortGUID.longDescription: This property defines port GUID that is hardcoded into a port . This hardcoded address can be changed using a firmware upgrade or a software configuration. When this change is made, the field must updated at the same time. If no hardcoded GUID exists for the InfiniBand card, PermanentAddress must be left blank.

PermanentiSCSIMACAddress.description: This property defines the network address that is hardcoded into a port for iSCSI. This hardcoded address can be changed using a firmware upgrade or a software configuration. When this change is made, the field must updated at the same time. If no hardcoded address exists for the NetworkAdapter, PermanentAddress must be left blank.
PermanentiSCSIMACAddress.longDescription: This property defines the network address that is hardcoded into a port for iSCSI. This hardcoded address can be changed using a firmware upgrade or a software configuration. When this change is made, the field must updated at the same time. If no hardcoded address exists for the NetworkAdapter, PermanentAddress must be left blank.

PrimaryStatus.description: This property represents the status of the device.
PrimaryStatus.longDescription: This property represents the status of the device.

ProductName.description: A string that contains the product name.
ProductName.longDescription: A string that contains the product name.

RDMAOSDriverVersion.description: This property represents the RDMA OS Driver version.
RDMAOSDriverVersion.longDescription: This property represents the RDMA OS Driver version.

SNAPIState.description: This property represents the SNAPI state.
SNAPIState.longDescription: This property represents the SNAPI state.

SNAPISupport.description: This property represents the SNAPI support.
SNAPISupport.longDescription: This property represents the SNAPI support.

SlotLength.description: This property represents the represents the slot length of the InfiniBand device.
SlotLength.longDescription: This property represents the represents the slot length of the InfiniBand device.

SlotType.description: This property indicates the slot type of the NIC PCI device.
SlotType.longDescription: This property indicates the slot type of the NIC PCI device.

UpdateLockdownCapable.description: This property represents the firmware update capable or not.
UpdateLockdownCapable.longDescription: This property represents the firmware update capable or not.

UpdateLockdownState.description: This property represents the update lock down mode state.
UpdateLockdownState.longDescription: This property represents the update lock down mode state.

VPISupport.description: This property represents the VPI support.
VPISupport.longDescription: This property represents the VPI support.

VendorName.description: This property represents the vendor name.
VendorName.longDescription: This property represents the vendor name.

VirtNodeGUID.description: A string that contains the Virtual Node GUID.
VirtNodeGUID.longDescription: A string that contains the Virtual Node GUID.

VirtPortGUID.description: A string that contains the virtual port GUID.
VirtPortGUID.longDescription: A string that contains the virtual port GUID.

VirtiSCSIMACAddress.description: A string that contains the virtual iSCSI MAC address.
VirtiSCSIMACAddress.longDescription: A string that contains the virtual iSCSI MAC address.

title: #DellInfiniBand.v1_2_0.DellInfiniBand
